alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Madison (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 6:21PM CDT until July 30 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Madison County in northwestern Arkansas... Southeastern Carroll County in northwestern Arkansas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 621 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles northwest of Rudd, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Berryville... Osage... Rudd... Rule... Dryfork... Cabanal... Metalton... Delmar... Connor... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
